website_summaries.verdict: This men's skincare gift set contains the three essential products for achieving a close shave and smooth skin and includes SPF 20.
pros: A three-piece set with shave cream, moisturizer, and cleanser that combine to make skin look great after shaving
We love that the moisturizers contains SPF 20
cons: Shave cream is on the thick and heavy side, which won't appeal to all men

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: I like all the products in this kit but quality control is horrible. I've gotten moisturizer that is different color than normal, the shaving cream container split open on the sides when it was still half full, the plastic caps break extremely easily if you drop it in the shower. I contacted their support to get replacements and they just ignored me. Call me crazy but at $25 for three trial size containers of product I would think it would be better quality and their customer service would be great. I won't be buying this garbage any more.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I liked the cleanser the best and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I liked the cleanser the best and it is my favorite product of that type. I am not a big fan of their shave cream as it clogs up any razor I try. It is a bit too thick and not slick enough for my tastes.
customer_reviews.author: Meds

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic products.  You can't beat Jack Black.
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat it. I am set with the stuff I like but my wife bought some Jack Black shaving cream as a gift. After trying it I could not go back. I have and use the whole Jack Black range of products now and am very happy. I highly recommend you give Jack Black a try. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Roy S.

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a fan of Jack Black products for years and bought this multi-pack for the value. While I value and use all three products, the Supreme Cream shave lather is my least favorite. I give it 3 stars, Dollar Shave Club's Shave Butter is superior. Overall I've never been disappointed by Jack Black products, and believe you won't get better men's luxury toiletries for the price. I also recommend Jack Black's Face Buff energizing scrub. Order this to spoil yourself or as a gift. You will return.
customer_reviews.author: CMaximus

customer_reviews.title: Great smell and smooth skin
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Jack Black Shave Essentials Set for my husband for Christmas. The face wash and the shave cream leave his face very smooth. They make it easier for him to keep his face clean because it is a scent that he enjoys using. The results are great.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Hubs likes it
customer_reviews.text: My husband really likes Jack Black! I bought it off of Bloomingdale’s for a long time but I like how I can get it quicker here on Amazon -it’s the same price. This is a great go to kit And also if he runs out his big bottle stuff he has this to resort to.
customer_reviews.author: LISA LOUTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great quality products
customer_reviews.text: Great quality products! Actually split these products up & gave one to my Dad & one to my husband & kept the lip balm for myself. Good quality @ good price!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela W.

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: This is my fiancé’s favorite face wash. He has issues with ingrown hairs after he shaves his face and this seems to be the only product that helps. Bought him the value pack due to him needing to moisturizing afterwards, men seem to forget that part.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Sold at Ulta for just a little more but husband likes it
customer_reviews.author: samantha schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Jack Black Gift Set - Smaller than I though..
customer_reviews.text: Jack Black Gift set was what I ordered, but it was much smaller than I expected. I gave as a gift for my dad. Wish it was a bit larger for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Jack Black products aren’t the least expensive, just the best
customer_reviews.author: michael moore

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for guys
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as Christmas gifts for my 20 and 22 year old sons. Good choice on my part. They loved it and I was a cool Mom for once.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a gift to my husband. He ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift to my husband. He has sensitive skin. This product has helped his skin clear out.
customer_reviews.author: Erica L

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and my husband loved it. It leaves the skin looking healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fragrance and quality products
customer_reviews.text: My hubby loves the products & I love the smell!!!
customer_reviews.author: sheri a. ferriman

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a guy
customer_reviews.text: Huge fan of jack black products. I got this for a friend and he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: FM

customer_reviews.title: Manly man
customer_reviews.text: The boyfriend now only uses this brand for face washes and shaving
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Good product but it didn't have the same fragrance I ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product but it didn't have the same fragrance I remembered from a previous purchase and that was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hilton

customer_reviews.title: Really good mens skincare
customer_reviews.text: Great products for men. The shave cream is excellent for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Steve thomas

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my hubby and he loves it. He uses it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the men’s Clinique line I prefer this product.
customer_reviews.author: Aislin Tomasik

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I didn't buy this product from Amazon, but was just looking to see the price of the product. I currently use all of the products included in the case and I will have to say the shave lotion is the best. It's the smoothest my razor has moved over my face. The facial moisturizer is the balm! My face tends to dry out on certain areas when I use soap. Try the products out, I wasn't disappointed. Then again, it was a gift.
customer_reviews.author: P00p

customer_reviews.title: Love Jack Black products!! Great gifts!
customer_reviews.text: This has quickly become one of my fav giftable products for men. They use ingredients that I would and have used. My friend has been extremely happy with his gift set from Christmas so I got my brother some for his birthday. Excellent products at an affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: AbbyNormal

customer_reviews.title: Love Jack Black products
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit. I use all 3 products daily and this is a great deal if you have ever priced these products individually. Fantastic for travel as well as home use. I use Jack Black hand lotion as well. Only wish they offered an even bigger version!!
customer_reviews.author: R. K. Hayes

product_meta.title: Jack Black - Shave Essentials Set
product_meta.description:
Step up your shave regimen with the pain-free shaving essentials included in Jack Black’s Shave Essentials Set. This set of superior facial care products cleanses, refreshes, hydrates, and protects. It includes a clay-based cleanser, a daily moisturizer with sunscreen, and a shaving cream. The set includes Deep Dive Glycolic Facial Cleanser, Supreme Cream Triple Cushion Shave Lather, and Double-Duty Face Moisturizer SPF 20. A $47 value!

Each product in the Jack Black Shave Essentials Set offers multiple benefits. Deep Dive Glycolic Facial Cleanser is a multifunctional clay-based cleanser that washes away dead skin cells, pore-clogging oil, and buildup. It can also be used as a deep cleansing mask. Supreme Cream Triple Cushion Shave Lather is a luxurious shaving cream that lifts hair up and away from the skin for a smooth, close shave that leaves the skin soft, hydrated, and refreshed. Double-Duty Face Moisturizer SPF 20 is a lightweight emollient moisturizer. It combines an advanced facial treatment and broad-spectrum sunscreen in one easy-to-use product.

Deep Dive Glycolic Facial Cleanser can be used two ways. When using it as a cleanser, apply a small amount to wet hands, work it into a creamy lather, and apply it to a slightly damp face using a circular motion. Rinse immediately. When using it as a mask, apply a small amount to a dry face and spread it evenly using a circular motion, avoiding the eye area and the lips. Allow it to dry for five minutes and rinse.Start with a slightly moist face. Apply an even layer of Supreme Cream over face and neck with the fingertips or a shaving brush. Activate it by working it into a rich, creamy lather using circular motions. Shave with a sharp, clean blade, rinsing the razor frequently. Rinse the face with cold water. The Double-Duty Face Moisturizer SPF 20 should be used after cleansing or shaving. Apply it liberally to the face and neck 15 minutes before sun exposure.



BRAND STORY
JACK BLACK CREATES SUPERIOR, ADVANCED SKIN CARE FOR MEN INCLUDING SHAVING CREAMS, MOISTURIZERS, GROOMING SETS, CLEANSERS, ANTI-AGING, HAIR CARE, BODY CARE AND SUN CARE PRODUCTS SPECIALLY FORMULATED FOR A MAN'S NEEDS.
